name: Organic Gentle Baby Oil
description:
This blend of the most gentle and hydrating oils is wonderful for your baby's skin. Use it for a baby massage or for hydration after a bath. Oil is fragrance-free and can be used on a newborn. Essential oils can be added if desired for a baby older than three months.

Packaged in a premium 2 oz. a glass bottle that can be reused or recycled and a metal screw top. Plastic-free.

Great for baby eczema and cradle cap.

Ingredients: Olive Oil*, Sweet Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil*, Grapeseed Oil, Vitamin E
*Indicates Certified Organic

Other Info:

No sulfates, phthalates or parabensâ€¦ever

Mailing packaging upcycled when possible

Everything is made with love <3

***This product has not been approved by the FDA though the individual ingredients have. This is not intended to replace the advice of a physician nor is it intended to treat, cure or prevent any disease.
